CodeList.Name: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend on one of those days to bicycle from place to place?: hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Bicycle Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - How much time did you usually spend on one of those days to bicycle from place to place?: minutes per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Bicycle Minutes per Day

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IPA03-Currently Have Job or Unpaid Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: IPA03-Currently Have Job or Unpaid Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - Do you currently have a job or do any unpaid work outside your home?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Currently Have Job or Unpaid Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you bicycle for at least 10 minutes at a time to go from place to place?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Bicycle Place to Place

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IPA03-Days Moderate as Part of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: IPA03-Days Moderate as Part of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like carrying light loads as part of your work?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Moderate as Part of Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities like bicycling at a regular pace, swimming at a regular pace, and doubles tennis in your leisure time?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Moderate in Leisure Time

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate activities like carrying light loads, sweeping, washing windows, and raking in the garden or yard?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Moderate in the Garden/Yard

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate activities like carrying light loads, washing windows, scrubbing floors and sweeping inside your home?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Moderate Inside Home

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IPA03-Days Travel in a Motor Vehicle
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: IPA03-Days Travel in a Motor Vehicle
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you travel in a motor vehicle like a train, bus, car or tram?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Travel in a Motor Vehicle

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: IPA03-Days Vigorous as Part of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: IPA03-Days Vigorous as Part of Work
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, digging, heavy construction, or climbing up stairs as part of your work?: days per week.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like aerobics, running, fast bicycling, or fast swimming in your leisure time?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Vigorous in Leisure Time

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (October 2002) - Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities like heavy lifting, chopping wood, shoveling snow, or digging in the garden or yard?: days per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Long Last 7 Days Self-Administered Format Version - Days Vigorous in the Garden/Yard
